long_description: Built with a soft lambswool fabric blend flecked with color, the Patagonia Ranchito women's hoodie has an oversized hood that adjusts with a narrow climbing-rope drawstring for warmth in any setting. Deep front placket assists in easy on/off; long sleeves snuggle cold hands. Deep center-front placket has metal buttons. Wide cuff and hem has contrast tipping. The Patagonia Ranchito women's hoodie offers a hip length. Drawstring is made out of old climbing rope for an authentic look.
short_description: Built with a soft lambswool fabric blend flecked with color, the Patagonia Ranchito women's hoodie has an oversized hood that adjusts with a narrow climbing-rope drawstring for warmth in any setting.
